verses.name: Ezekiel 33:1
verses.text: Again the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,

verses.name: Ezekiel 33:2
verses.text: Son of man, speak to the children of thy people, and say unto them, When I bring the sword upon a land, if the people of the land take a man of their coasts, and set him for their watchman:

verses.name: Ezekiel 33:3
verses.text: If when he seeth the sword come upon the land, he blow the trumpet, and warn the people;

verses.name: Ezekiel 33:4
verses.text: Then whosoever heareth the sound of the trumpet, and taketh not warning; if the sword come, and take him away, his blood shall be upon his own head.
